MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW11 postcode area of Sandbach, affecting properties in Reynold Lane  and surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of complex repairs that are needed following third party damage to our underground cable network near Arclid  and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you  for your patience. This message was updated at 11:36 AM on 19th March 2021.
